page.title: 03A VILLAGE POLICEMAN BURWELL.
page.content: {The village policeman}lives in the {police house}on The Causeway. He is our only policeman. He has been a policeman for 12 years but only lived here for 18 months. When he wakes up on duty days he rings{Ely Headquarters}to find out if there are any jobs that need doing.If so he will go and do them.He {bikes in the daytime}but{walks the {beat at night.}He often{visits}the{old {people}to see if they are all right. He helps at the Village College with things like Sports Day.He spent 1-2 years{training}to be a policeman at Ashford in Kent. His{uniform}is black tie,jacket, trousers and shoes with a white shirt. He has a{walkie-talkie radio}at his waist so he can go quickly if anything happens or get help if he needs it.
